casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.
v.
David GROGINS, Executor (Estate of Anna S. Grogins), et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 5, 2019

Ridgely Whitmore Brown, in support of the petition.

Robert J. Wichowski, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 477, 208 A.3d 662 (2019), is denied.
